description: Jewelry lovers know that not all pieces are created equal but when it comes to chains, one stands above the rest in terms of style, durability, and pure swag factor, and that’s the Marina Anchor link chain. The Marina Chain has been adapted to beautify the Anchor Chain with a bar to enhance sparkle. Marina Chain is one of the best looking link styles the result is stunning. Somewhat Puffed in appearance, with two holes on each side and each link has been highly polished finish to create a stunning sparkle. Perfect to wear as an everyday accessory and can be simply worn on its own or paired with chain bracelets. This jewelry showpiece has basically always been a part of the conversation among the fashionable elite and its fame hasn’t slowed much, and we’ve seen all the great hip-hop fashion influencers sporting it. It’s definitely a piece you’re going to add on to your collection if your endgame is finding an eye-catching chain that endures. This necklace and the bracelet are made of sterling silver and this is nickel-free, lead-free and hypoallergenic making it safe for all skin types. These bracelets, and anklets are all Italian and available in two chic color variation: Rhodium Plated or Gold Plated. The 6mm bracelets are available in 7 inch bracelets chains while the 4 mm anklets available in 9" long chain, a classic style with a bit of modern edge. This Marina links twist into a cable-like design, which gives it a bit of a traditional look. This kind of chain is perfect for all kinds of wearers and styles. Though it’s seen as somewhat traditional, this chain has some serious built-in swagger with trendsetters and trailblazers wearing them Marina Anchor chain links come in a variety of different weights, thicknesses, and lengths.
